about.title: About Dildora Tours
about.description1: Founded in 2025, Dildora Tours has been sharing the beauty and culture of Uzbekistan with travelers from around the world. Our mission is to provide authentic, immersive experiences that showcase the true essence of our country.
about.description2: With a team of experienced local guides and travel experts, we create journeys that connect travelers with the heart of Uzbekistan – from its ancient Silk Road cities to its breathtaking landscapes and warm, hospitable people.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate professionals dedicated to creating exceptional travel experiences

testimonials.title: What Our Travelers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from those who have explored Uzbekistan with us

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions about our tours or want to create a custom itinerary? Get in touch with our team, and we'll be happy to help you plan your perfect Uzbekistan adventure.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates, travel tips, and exclusive offers

footer.description: Creating unforgettable travel experiences in Uzbekistan since 2025. Our mission is to share the beauty and culture of our country with travelers from around the world.
